resources.string: First, we need to calibrate your Muse headband.
There is nothing to connect to.
The mobile isn\'t connected to any device!
You have to connect to a Muse headband!
You have to calibrate your Muse headband!
Muse needs a few permissions to work properly. On the next screens, tap "Allow" to proceed. If you deny, Muse will not work properly until you go into your Android settings and allow.
